title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Skills: Federated Learning Design and Optimization in Wireless Edge Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the communication-learning interaction principles of federated learning in wireless edge environments and apply AirComp-based computation methods.
Learners can design a two-stage federated learning structure using hierarchical clustering methods.
Learners can mathematically model optimization problems based on Channel State Information (CSI) and propose solutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
